items.sentence: Is it true that you learned French all by yourself?
It sounds like you have class on Saturdays as well.
Let\'s just pretend like we don\'t know each other.
Tom is the only one who really knows what happened.
Is this the first time you\'ve eaten Japanese food?
I wouldn\'t do that for all the money in the world.
Call me when you get there, so I know you\'re safe.
Tom slowed down at the stop sign, but didn\'t stop.
Tom told me that it was possible to rent a bicycle.
I wasn\'t careful, and now I\'m sunburned all over.
